titleStmt.title: A collection of the contents, of all the chapters contained in the Bible according to the translation which is appointed to be read in churches.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Allde, dwelling on Lambard hill, neere olde Fish-streete,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 5556a on UMI microfilm reel 738.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
